> "Aww Slag, if we don't change Perceptor's signature Wheels will also be a=
 gonner! Lord Elder, I can do this, I've done it before! Just say the word =
and it's done. This is Rat Trap ta Wheels and Perceptor, Over, better stay =
where you are for now, I know I can convert Perceptor's signature but I'm g=
onna need some time ta do that, and of course, permission ta access his sig=
nature files. Once that's done, it'll only take a few minutes ta change it.=
"

The Ark weapons are trained on Perceptor, although they seem to be
unabl=
e to establish a true lock as Tuscon is standing between them and
their int=
ended target. Meanwhile the alarms continue to go off.

Lord Elder's voice =
can be heard over the radio, "What's going on? Are
we under attack?" Elder =
was in the inner recesses of the Ark talking
with Cheetor when the alarms w=
ent off.

The computer responds to Rat Trap's clearance codes allowing him
=
access to the systems. A view screen near his position clearly shows
the co=
mputer attempting to target lock Perceptor, and Tuscon blocking.
He can als=
o see the commands to take manual control of the systems
should he choose.
=
